descriptionHtml:
Hello community!This is my First mod for Skyrim, im new to the creation kit. Note: This mod do not add anything new, the items already exist in Skyrim.Reqiurements: Nothing, Just Skyrim, Installation: Very Simple, just put the Downloaded .esp file into your Skyrim Data folder. Description: If you started a New Game and you dont have any good Armor or much Gold, This mod will be Great to help you Start in the Game :) Its like a Starter kit :DThis mod adds a simple Chest with Powerfull Deadric Armor and Much expensive Jewels and much gold in it! And the best thing is: You can just open the Chest! Its not even Locked.But its Hidden, Its hidden in one of the Pools In whiterun Near the DragenFortress building [See Screenshots] The pools are at the left and the right site of the Stairs, search the Drowned chest and get Awesome Loot!
This is a simple mod, it adds nothing new so i think not much players will like this "Mod"
Im a new Modder and i didnt had much ideas for now, im planing to create bigger mods which will actually add new stuff too, i will give my best.
Please enjoy this "Mod" and try out my other mods [Coming Soon!]
author: ClashLord
